topComments.author: Auro Granja
topComments.comment: Divertido, mas no inicio tudo muito rapido. Pizza boa,mas nao repete, mesmo estando fria...na media em reais um investimento alto !

topComments.author: Crystal Watson
topComments.comment: For pizza & salad the food was actually very hot & fresh. The service was outstanding.  As for the show..."What The?!"ü§£ü§£ As a family with 2 kids(9&10) and 2 adults, we had a blast. Laughing the entire time! Definitely will do this again next time we vacation here!

topComments.author: Daniel Armour
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Show de divers√£o boa mistura de magia e piadas. Ele parece ser muito bom em evitar pessoas que realmente n√£o querem subir. As crian√ßas gostaram muito e meu filho ficou super feliz em receber um n√∫mero.  Pizza foi realmente bom vem como metade calabresa e metade queijo. Voc√™ tamb√©m recebe uma tigela de salada b√°sica. Eu tamb√©m n√£o como, mas o resto da fam√≠lia estava bem alimentado. Finaliza com um pequeno quadrado de bolo.  As op√ß√µes de bebidas s√£o boas, embora mudar sua bebida possa ser complicado. Servidor se esqueceu de nos trazer a cerveja, mas √©ramos um grupo de quatro, o resto da longa mesa era um grupo, ent√£o ele estava com as m√£os cheias. Embora ele tenha se assegurado de que tiv√©ssemos um casal antes de irmos, ficamos felizes.  Viemos em um passe que compramos antes de voarmos, mas olhando para o pre√ßo, eu diria que √© um valor pelo dinheiro.  Ent√£o, em conclus√£o, show divertido, comida divertida e saborosa, se voc√™ gosta de pizza.  (Original) Fun show good mix of magic and jokes. He seems to be quite good at avoiding people who really don't want to go up. Kids really enjoyed it and my son was super happy to get asked for a number.  Pizza was really good comes as half pepperoni and half cheese. You also get a bowl of basic salad. I don't eat either but the rest of the family was well fed. Finishes with a small square of cake.  Drink options are OK though changing your drink can be tricky. Server forgot to bring us the beer but we were a party of four the rest of the long table was one group so he had his hands full. Though he made sure we had a couple before we went so left happy.  We came on a pass we bought before we flew over but looking at the price I'd say its value for money.  So in conclusion fun show, entertaining, yummy food if you like pizza.

topComments.author: Katrina B
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O show foi muito bom e meu filho adorou e isso foi o principal. Eu deixei com fome, por√©m, havia 3 grupos separados em nossa mesa, um casal, um pai e filha e eu e meu filho. A tigela de salada foi compartilhada entre n√≥s 6 e estava vazia quando chegou a mim (eu fui o √∫ltimo). Os outros 2 grupos pegaram suas pizzas 10 minutos antes de n√≥s e deram ao meu filho autista algumas de suas pizzas enquanto esper√°vamos pela nossa quando ele come√ßou a ficar chateado, eu devolvi as fatias quando a nossa apareceu. Ent√£o, filho desembarcou com 3/4 da pizza (6 fatias) e eu consegui 2 fatias. Brownie para pudim, mas estava bem seco. As bebidas oferecidas eram todas refrigerantes, voc√™ precisa pedir especificamente cerveja e vinho. A pizza era boa, mas eu poderia ter feito com mais. Realmente gostei do show e iria novamente, o servidor estava ocupado servindo a noite toda e foi amig√°vel. Portanto, 4 de 5 devido a n√£o ser realmente tudo o que voc√™ pode comer.  (Original) The show was really good and my son loved it and that was the main thing. I did leave hungry though, there was 3 separate groups on our table, a couple, a father and daughter and me and my son. The salad bowl was shared between the 6 of us and was empty when it got to me (i was last). The other 2 groups got their pizzas 10 minutes before us and did give my autistic child some of their pizza while we waited for ours as he started to get upset, i gave back the slices when ours turned up. So son landed up with 3/4 of the pizza (6slices) and I got 2 slices. Brownie for pudding but was quite dry. Drinks offered were all soft drinks, you need to specifically ask for beer and wine. The pizza was nice but I could of done with more. Really enjoyed the show and would go again, server was busy serving all night and was friendly. So 4 out of 5 due to it not really being all you can eat.

The extra money we paid for the dinner and show was well worth it without a doubt.
